page.title: 11A Prestbury Restaurant.
page.content: Mr. Ray Buckley is the present owner of Prestbury Place,a small and intimate restaurant.He has spent fifteen years in the restaurant business in several different establishments,including one in Prestbury.Prestbury Place was once a 17th Century cottage which had been converted into a restaurant.When Mr.Buckley took over in 1984 he had the restaurant refurbished and modernised. The restaurant's customers come from the local area,as well as people visiting Prestbury.Local business is important so a daily lunchtime menu is provided. The peak time for trade is in the evening.He offers several choices of starters,main courses and sweets on his menu as well as several kinds of wine.
